articles.author: Kristian Johnson
articles.title: Controversial Emmerdale storyline slammed as 'disturbing' - Leeds Live
articles.description: Episodes see Laurel Thomas (Charlotte Bellamy) and her partner Jai (Chris Bisson) decide to terminate a pregnancy once they find out their unborn child has Down Syndrome
articles.content:
An upcoming storyline on Emmerdale has drawn criticism from the founder of a Down Syndrome charity for promoting a "pro-termination" stance.
